Title: Relates to allowing for the electronic submission of a notice that a member of a retirement system participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations for a qualifying period
Summary: Allows for the electronic submission of a notice that a member of a retirement system participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations for a qualifying period.
LawCode: Amd §§2, 363-bb & 605, R & SS L; amd §13-168, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for the electronic submission of a notice that a member of a retirement system participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations for a qualifying period
